TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataBoundControlAdapter extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter

summary.span: 根据特定浏览器请求自定义与适配器关联的 对象的行为。

span.span: Customizes the behavior of a object with which the adapter is associated for specific browser requests.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 派生的控件类绑定到数据源，并通过枚举它绑定到数据源中的项来生成其用户界面或子控件层次结构。A control derived from the class is bound to a data source and generates its user interface or child control hierarchy by enumerating the items in the data source to which it is bound. 是一个抽象基类，用于定义可以如绑定到数据源的所有控件的一般特征和控件。 is an abstract base class that defines the common characteristics of all controls that can be bound to a data source, such as the and controls. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see . 一个修改的行为特定浏览器或作为筛选器针对某些功能的浏览器或行为的类。A modifies the behavior of a for a specific browser or class of browsers, or acts as a filter on some capability. 呈现行为的适应性很多可以封装在派生的专用类类。Much of the adaptability in rendering behavior can be encapsulated in the specialized classes that derive from the class. 因此，很可能一个适配器可以用于多种浏览器类行为，或者包括在适应性类可以进行不必要的控件适配器使用。Therefore, it is likely that a single adapter can be used for a number of browser class behaviors or that inclusion of the adaptability in the classes can make the use of a control adapter unnecessary. 每个控件具有显式映射到适配器通过.browser 定义文件，如果有``这些文件中的条目。Each control has explicit mappings to adapters through the .browser definition files, if there are `` entries in these files. 因此，任何访问的属性使用从.browser 定义文件来查找到控件适配器的映射中提取的对象。Thus, any access to the property of the uses the object extracted from the .browser definition files to perform the lookup for the mapping of the adapter to control. 在处理期间，.NET Framework 截获对可能是特定的浏览器控件的方法的调用。During processing, the .NET Framework intercepts calls to the methods of a control that could be browser specific. 如果附加了控件适配器，.NET Framework 调用关联的适配器方法。If a control adapter is attached, the .NET Framework calls the associated adapter methods. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see . M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.DataBoundControlAdapter.PerformDataBinding(System.Collections.IEnumerable) 方法绑定到关联的可枚举集合。The M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.DataBoundControlAdapter.PerformDataBinding(System.Collections.IEnumerable) method binds an enumerable collection to the associated . 属性返回对的强类型化的引用。The property returns a strongly typed reference to the . ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建并使用两个派生的控件：The following code examples create and use two derived controls: - `MyDataBound`派生的类，是一个简单的只读网格控件。The `MyDataBound` class, derived from , is a simple read-only grid control. - `MyDataBoundAdapter`派生的类，使用行分隔符，适用于小屏幕浏览器将网格数据呈现为一维列表。The `MyDataBoundAdapter` class, derived from , renders the grid data as a one-dimensional list with row separators, suitable for small screen browsers. 第一个代码示例使用一个网页来声明`MyDataBound`控制和的实例提供数据的窗体中对象。The first code example uses a Web page to declare a `MyDataBound` control and an instance of that provides data in the form of a object. 第二个代码示例包含的派生`MyDataBound`和`MyDataBoundAdapter`类：The second code example contains the derived `MyDataBound` and `MyDataBoundAdapter` classes: - `MyDataBound`类将重写方法来保存数据源和替代集合方法以呈现为 html 格式的数据源``。The `MyDataBound` class overrides the method to save an collection for the data source, and overrides the method to render the data source as an HTML `
`. - `MyDataBoundAdapter`类将重写若要将数据源保存到一个一维并添加行分隔符。The `MyDataBoundAdapter` class overrides to save the data source to a one-dimensional and add row separators.它将替代呈现由分隔的字段的列表作为`
`标记。It overrides to render the as a list of fields separated by `
` tags. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.DataBoundControlAdapter#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.DataBoundControlAdapter/CS/mydatabound.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.DataBoundControlAdapter#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.DataBoundControlAdapter/VB/mydatabound.vb#1)] 第三个代码示例使用配置文件来指定要用于没有控件适配器`MyDataBound`控件对于 Microsoft Internet Explorer 浏览器，并且`MyDataBoundAdapter`用于`MyDataBound`Openwave 向上浏览器的控件。The third code example uses a configuration file to specify that no control adapter is to be used with `MyDataBound` controls for Microsoft Internet Explorer browsers, and that a `MyDataBoundAdapter` is used with `MyDataBound` controls for Openwave UP browsers.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

remarks.format: ## Remarks .NET Framework 在内部构建的新实例类时它会创建相应对象。The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the class when it creates the corresponding object.

MemberSignature.Value: Protected ReadOnly Property Control As DataBoundControl

summary.span: 检索对与此控件适配器关联的 对象的强类型引用。

span.span: Retrieves a strongly-typed reference to the object associated with this control adapter.
The to which this is attached.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当对象附加到控件，.NET Framework 调用某些适配器成员而不是控件成员。When a object is attached to a control, the .NET Framework calls certain adapter members instead of the control members. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写适配器中的属性派生自类。The following code example shows how to override the property in an adapter derived from the class. 它将返回对的强类型化的引用`MyDataBound`控件。It returns a strongly typed reference to the `MyDataBound` control. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.DataBoundControlAdapter#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.DataBoundControlAdapter/CS/mydatabound.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.DataBoundControlAdapter#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.DataBoundControlAdapter/VB/mydatabound.vb#2)]

para.span: 继承自类，应至少实现属性以返回该控件的强类型的实例，如示例部分中所示

span.span: When you inherit from the class, you should, at a minimum, implement a property to return a strongly typed instance of the control, as shown in the Example section

summary.span: 将关联的 对象的数据源中的数据绑定到控件适配器。

span.span: Binds the data in the data source of the associated object to the control adapter.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 方法调用来代替方法时控件适配器附加到控件派生自类。The method is called in place of the method when a control adapter is attached to a control derived from the class. 通常情况下的重写循环访问数据，从而产生不同的名称和值，如有必要，并将其保存到内部集合。Typically, an override of iterates through data, creating distinct names and values when necessary, and saves it to an internal collection. 通常情况下，或类似的方法将填充在该内部集合中的用户界面或子控件。Usually, or a similar method of the will populate the user interface or child controls from that internal collection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写集合，用于保存数据源到一维对象，并添加行分隔符。The following code example shows how to override the collection to save the data source to a one-dimensional object and add row separators. 它还演示如何重写方法以呈现由分隔的字段的列表作为`
`标记。It also shows how to override the method to render the as a list of fields separated by `
` tags. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.DataBoundControlAdapter#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.DataBoundControlAdapter/CS/mydatabound.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.DataBoundControlAdapter#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.DataBoundControlAdapter/VB/mydatabound.vb#3)]

para.span: 重写方法专用绑定逻辑时是必需的目标浏览器-例如，项名称必须在构造时以不同的方式比控件的常规用法。

span.span: Override the method when specialized binding logic is required for the target browser - for example, when item names must be constructed differently than for the general usage of the control.

para.span: 应调用基方法，仅当需要的数据绑定功能。

span.span: You should call the base method only if you require the data binding functionality of the .
